doc.title: Welcome to Tijuana
doc.plot: Welcome To Tijuana - Documentary in the 21th century How do we sensitize people in times of daily stimulus satiations? Where does 'documentary' move to in times of MTV and fiber optics? How can we show social critism and avoid repeating same old phrases? Focusing on migration issues in and outside the Mexican border town Tijuana by showing the situation through the eyes of the Mexican migrants. A deeply emotional, ironical, sometimes even cynical situation at the same time, Welcome To Tijuana tries to provide answers. Welcome to Tijuana is a symbiosis between the traditional and modern, in form and content rooted in old and modern Mexican culture.
